pageContext.claim: “So impt Rep Senators, under leadership of @SenateMajLdr McConnell get healthcare plan approved. After 7yrs of O'Care disaster, must happen! ”
pageContext.analysis: To put it in context, the number of people affected by premium increases is just one-fourteenth the size of the employment-based health-insurance market-- and eight out of ten people in the Obamacare exchanges receive subsidies to shield them from premium increases. Moreover, some of the initial steps taken by the Trump administration have helped worsen the problems in the individual insurance market — allowing Trump to create a self-fulfilling prophecy.
